states.name: Andhra Pradesh
states.territories: The territories specified in sub-section (2) of section 3 of the Andhra State Act, 1953, sub-section (1) of section 3 of the States Reorganisation Act, 1956, the First Schedule to the Andhra Pradesh and Madras (Alteration of Boundaries) Act, 1959, and the Schedule to the Andhra Pradesh and Mysore (Transfer of Territory) Act, 1968, but excluding the territories specified in the Second Schedule to the Andhra Pradesh and Madras (Alteration of Boundaries) Act, 1959 and the territories specified in section 3 of the Andhra Pradesh Reorganisation Act, 2014.
footnotes: Subs. by the Constitution (Seventh Amendment) Act, 1956, s. 2, for the First Sch. (w.e.f. 1-11-1956).
Subs. by the Andhra Pradesh and Mysore (Transfer of Territory) Act, 1968 (36 of 1968), s. 4, for the former entry (w.e.f. 1-10-1968).

states.name: Assam
states.territories: The territories which immediately before the commencement of this Constitution were comprised in the Province of Assam, the Khasi States and the Assam Tribal Areas, but excluding the territories specified in the Schedule to the Assam (Alteration of Boundaries) Act, 1951 and the territories specified in sub-section (2) of section 3 of the State of Nagaland Act, 1962 and the territories specified in sections 5, 6 and 7 of the North-Eastern Areas (Reorganisation) Act, 1971 and the territories referred to in Part I of the Second Schedule to the Constitution (One Hundredth Amendment) Act, 2015, notwithstanding anything contained in clause (a) of section 3 of the Constitution (Ninth Amendment) Act, 1960, so far as it relates to the territories referred to in Part II of the Second Schedule to the Constitution (One Hundredth Amendment) Act, 2015.
footnotes: Now a State by the State of Nagaland Act, 1962 (27 of 1962), s. 4 (w.e.f. 1-12-1963).
Territory altered by the North-Eastern Areas (Reorganisation) Act, 1971 (81 of 1971), s. 3 (w.e.f. 21-1-1972).
For text of the Act, see Appendix I.

states.name: Bihar
states.territories: The territories which immediately before the commencement of this Constitution were either comprised in the Province of Bihar or were being administered as if they formed part of that Province and the territories specified in clause (a) of sub-section (1) of section 3 of the Bihar and Uttar Pradesh (Alteration of Boundaries) Act, 1968, but excluding the territories specified in sub-section (1) of section 3 of the Bihar and West Bengal (Transfer of Territories) Act, 1956, and the territories specified in clause (b) of sub-section (1) of section 3 of the first mentioned Act and the territories specified in section 3 of the Bihar Reorganisation Act, 2000.
footnotes: Subs. by the Bihar and Uttar Pradesh (Alteration of Boundaries) Act, 1968 (24 of 1968), s. 4, for the former entry (w.e.f. 1-6-1970).
Added by the Bihar Reorganisation Act, 2000 (30 of 2000), s. 5 (w.e.f. 15-11-2000).

states.name: Gujarat
states.territories: The territories referred to in sub-section (1) of section 3 of the Bombay Reorganisation Act, 1960.
footnotes: Subs. by the Bombay Reorganisation Act, 1960 (11 of 1960), s. 4 (w.e.f. 1-5-1960).

states.name: Kerala
states.territories: The territories specified in sub-section (1) of section 5 of the States Reorganisation Act, 1956.

states.name: Madhya Pradesh
states.territories: The territories specified in sub-section (1) of section 9 of the States Reorganisation Act, 1956 and the First Schedule to the Rajasthan and Madhya Pradesh (Transfer of Territories) Act, 1959, but excluding the territories specified in section 3 of the Madhya Pradesh Reorganisation Act, 2000.
footnotes: Ins. by the Rajasthan and Madhya Pradesh (Transfer of Territories) Act, 1959 (47 of 1959), s. 4 (w.e.f. 1-11-1959).
Added by the Madhya Pradesh Reorganisation Act, 2000 (28 of 2000), s. 5 (w.e.f. 1-11-2000).

states.name: Tamil Nadu
states.territories: The territories which immediately before the commencement of this Constitution were either comprised in the Province of Madras or were being administered as if they formed part of that Province and the territories specified in section 4 of the States Reorganisation Act, 1956, and the Second Schedule to the Andhra Pradesh and Madras (Alteration of Boundaries) Act, 1959, but excluding the territories specified in sub-section (1) of section 3 and sub-section (1) of section 4 of the Andhra State Act, 1953 and the territories specified in clause (b) of sub-section (1) of section 5, section 6 and clause (a) of sub-section (1) of section 7 of the States Reorganisation Act, 1956 and the territories specified in the First Schedule to the Andhra Pradesh and Madras (Alteration of Boundaries) Act, 1959.
footnotes: Subs. by the Madras State (Alteration of Name) Act, 1968 (53 of 1968), s. 5, for 'Madras' (w.e.f. 14-1-1969).
Ins. by the Andhra Pradesh and Madras (Alteration of Boundaries) Act, 1959 (56 of 1959), s. 6 (w.e.f. 1-4-1960).
Subs. by s. 6, ibid., for certain words (w.e.f. 1-4-1960).

states.name: Maharashtra
states.territories: The territories specified in sub-section (1) of section 8 of the States Reorganisation Act, 1956, but excluding the territories referred to in sub-section (1) of section 3 of the Bombay Reorganisation Act, 1960.
footnotes: Ins. by the Bombay Reorganisation Act, 1960 (11 of 1960), s. 4 (w.e.f. 1-5-1960).

states.name: Karnataka
states.territories: The territories specified in sub-section (1) of section 7 of the States Reorganisation Act, 1956, but excluding the territory specified in the Schedule to the Andhra Pradesh and Mysore (Transfer of Territory) Act, 1968.
footnotes: Entries 8 to 15 re-numbered as entries 9 to 15 by the Bombay Reorganisation Act, 1960 (11 of 1960), s. 4 (w.e.f. 1-5-1960).
Ins. by the Andhra Pradesh and Mysore (Transfer of Territory) Act, 1968 (36 of 1968), s. 4 (w.e.f. 1-10-1968).

states.name: Odisha
states.territories: The territories which immediately before the commencement of this Constitution were either comprised in the Province of Orissa or were being administered as if they formed part of that Province.
footnotes: Entries 8 to 14 renumbered as entries 9 to 15 by the Bombay Reorganisation Act, 1960 (11 of 1960), s. 4 (w.e.f. 1-5-1960).
Subs. by the Orissa (Alteration of Name) Act, 2011 (15 of 2011), s. 6, for 'Orissa' (w.e.f. 1-11-2011).

states.name: Punjab
states.territories: The territories specified in section 11 of the States Reorganisation Act, 1956 and the territories referred to in Part II of the First Schedule to the Acquired Territories (Merger) Act, 1960 but excluding the territories referred to in Part II of the First Schedule to the Constitution (Ninth Amendment) Act, 1960 and the territories specified in sub-section (1) of section 3, section 4 and sub-section (1) of section 5 of the Punjab Reorganisation Act, 1966.
footnotes: Ins. by the Acquired Territories (Merger) Act, 1960 (64 of 1960), s. 4 (w.e.f. 17-1-1961).
Added by the Constitution (Ninth Amendment) Act, 1960, s. 3 (w.e.f. 17-1-1961).
Added by the Punjab Reorganisation Act, 1966 (31 of 1966), s. 7 (w.e.f. 1-11-1966).

states.name: Rajasthan
states.territories: The territories specified in section 10 of the States Reorganisation Act, 1956 but excluding the territories specified in the First Schedule to the Rajasthan and Madhya Pradesh (Transfer of Territories) Act, 1959.
footnotes: Ins. by the Rajasthan and Madhya Pradesh (Transfer of Territories) Act, 1959 (47 of 1959), s. 4 (w.e.f. 1-10-1959).

states.name: Uttar Pradesh
states.territories: The territories which immediately before the commencement of this Constitution were either comprised in the Province known as the United Provinces or were being administered as if they formed part of that Province, the territories specified in clause (b) of sub-section (1) of section 3 of the Bihar and Uttar Pradesh (Alteration of Boundaries) Act, 1968, and the territories specified in clause (b) of sub-section (1) of section 4 of the Haryana and Uttar Pradesh (Alteration of Boundaries) Act, 1979, but excluding the territories specified in clause (a) of sub-section (1) of section 3 of the Bihar and Uttar Pradesh (Alteration of Boundaries) Act, 1968, and the territories specified in section 3 of the Uttar Pradesh Reorganisation Act, 2000 and the territories specified in clause (a) of sub-section (1) of section 4 of the Haryana and Uttar Pradesh (Alteration of Boundaries) Act, 1979.
footnotes: Entries 8 to 14 renumbered as entries 9 to 15 by the Bombay Reorganisation Act, 1960 (11 of 1960), s. 4 (w.e.f. 1-5-1960).
Subs. by the Haryana and Uttar Pradesh (Alteration of Boundaries) Act, 1979 (31 of 1979), s. 5, for the entry against '13. Uttar Pradesh' (w.e.f. 15-3-1983).
Ins. by the Uttar Pradesh Reorganisation Act, 2000 (29 of 2000), s. 5 (w.e.f. 9-11-2000).

states.name: West Bengal
states.territories: The territories which immediately before the commencement of this Constitution were either comprised in the Province of West Bengal or were being administered as if they formed part of that Province and the territory of Chandernagore as included in clause (c) of section 2 of the Chandernagore (Merger) Act, 1954 and the territories specified in sub-section (1) of section 3 of the Bihar and West Bengal (Transfer of Territories) Act, 1956 and also the territories referred to in Part III of the First Schedule but excluding the territories referred to in Part III of the Second Schedule to the Constitution (Ninth Amendment) Act, 1960, so far as it relates to the territories referred to in Part II of the First Schedule and also excluding the territories referred to in Part III of the Second Schedule to the Constitution (One Hundredth Amendment) Act, 2015.
footnotes: Entries 8 to 14 renumbered as entries 9 to 15 by the Bombay Reorganisation Act, 1960 (11 of 1960), s. 4 (w.e.f. 1-5-1960).
Added by the Constitution (One Hundredth Amendment) Act, 2015, s. 3 (w.e.f. 31-7-2015). For the text of the Act, see Appendix I.

states.name: Nagaland
states.territories: The territories specified in sub-section (1) of section 3 of the State of Nagaland Act, 1962.
footnotes: Ins. by the State of Nagaland Act, 1962 (27 of 1962), s. 4 (w.e.f. 1-12-1963).

states.name: Haryana
states.territories: The territories specified in sub-section (1) of section 3 of the Punjab Reorganisation Act, 1966 and the territories specified in clause (a) of sub-section (1) of section 4 of the Haryana and Uttar Pradesh (Alteration of Boundaries) Act, 1979, but excluding the territories specified in clause (b) of sub-section (1) of section 4 of that Act.
footnotes: Added by the Punjab Reorganisation Act, 1966 (31 of 1966), s. 7 (w.e.f. 1-11-1966) and the entry therein subsequently amended by the Haryana and Uttar Pradesh (Alteration of Boundaries) Act, 1979 (31 of 1979), s. 5 (w.e.f. 15-3-1983).

states.name: Himachal Pradesh
states.territories: The territories which immediately before the commencement of this Constitution were being administered as if they were Chief Commissioner’s Provinces under the names of Himachal Pradesh and Bilaspur and the territories specified in sub-section (1) of section 5 of the Punjab Reorganisation Act, 1966.
footnotes: Subs. by the Himachal Pradesh and Bilaspur (New State) Act, 1954 (32 of 1954), s. 3, for the entry against '17. Himachal Pradesh' (w.e.f. 1-7-1954).
Amended by the Punjab Reorganisation Act, 1966 (31 of 1966), s. 7 (w.e.f. 1-11-1966).

states.name: Manipur
states.territories: The territory which immediately before the commencement of this Constitution was being administered as if it were a Chief Commissioner’s Province under the name of Manipur.
footnotes: Ins. by the North-Eastern Areas (Reorganisation) Act, 1971 (81 of 1971), s. 9 (w.e.f. 21-1-1972).

states.name: Tripura
states.territories: The territory which immediately before the commencement of this Constitution was being administered as if it were a Chief Commissioner’s Province under the name of Tripura and the territories referred to in Part II of the First Schedule to the Constitution (One Hundredth Amendment) Act, 2015, notwithstanding anything contained in clause (a) of section 3 of the Constitution (Ninth Amendment) Act, 1960, so far as it relates to the territories referred to in Part II of the First Schedule to the Constitution (One Hundredth Amendment) Act, 2015.
footnotes: Entries 16 to 29 renumbered as entries 15 to 28 by the Jammu and Kashmir Reorganisation Act, 2019 (34 of 2019), s. 6 (w.e.f. 31-10-2019).
Added by the Constitution (One Hundredth Amendment) Act, 2015, s. 3 (w.e.f. 31-7-2015). For the text of the Act, see Appendix I.

states.name: Meghalaya
states.territories: The territories specified in section 5 of the North-Eastern Areas (Reorganisation) Act, 1971 and the territories referred to in Part I of the First Schedule but excluding the territories referred to in Part II of the Second Schedule to the Constitution (One Hundredth Amendment) Act, 2015.
footnotes: Ins. by the North-Eastern Areas (Reorganisation) Act, 1971 (81 of 1971), s. 6 (w.e.f. 21-1-1972).

states.name: Sikkim
states.territories: The territories which immediately before the commencement of the Constitution (Thirty-sixth Amendment) Act, 1975, were comprised in Sikkim.
footnotes: Ins. by the Constitution (Thirty-sixth Amendment) Act, 1975, s. 2 (w.e.f. 26-4-1975).

states.name: Mizoram
states.territories: The territories specified in section 6 of the North-Eastern Areas (Reorganisation) Act, 1971.
footnotes: Ins. by the State of Mizoram Act, 1986 (34 of 1986), s. 3 (w.e.f. 20-2-1987).

states.name: Arunachal Pradesh
states.territories: The territories specified in section 7 of the North-Eastern Areas (Reorganisation) Act, 1971.
footnotes: Ins. by the State of Arunachal Pradesh Act, 1986 (69 of 1986), s. 3 (w.e.f. 20-2-1987).

states.name: Goa
states.territories: The territories specified in section 3 of the Goa, Daman and Diu Reorganisation Act, 1987.
footnotes: Ins. by the Goa, Daman and Diu Reorganisation Act, 1987 (18 of 1987), s. 5 (w.e.f. 30-5-1987).

states.name: Chhattisgarh
states.territories: The territories specified in section 3 of the Madhya Pradesh Reorganisation Act, 2000.
footnotes: Added by the Madhya Pradesh Reorganisation Act, 2000 (28 of 2000), s. 5 (w.e.f. 1-11-2000).

states.name: Uttarakhand
states.territories: The territories specified in section 3 of the Uttar Pradesh Reorganisation Act, 2000.
footnotes: Ins. by the Uttar Pradesh Reorganisation Act, 2000 (29 of 2000), s. 5 (w.e.f. 9-11-2000).
Subs. by the Uttaranchal (Alteration of Name) Act, 2006 (29 of 2006), s. 4, for the word 'Uttaranchal' (w.e.f. 1-1-2007).

states.name: Jharkhand
states.territories: The territories specified in section 3 of the Bihar Reorganisation Act, 2000.
footnotes: Added by the Bihar Reorganisation Act, 2000 (30 of 2000), s. 5 (w.e.f. 15-11-2000).

states.name: Telangana
states.territories: The territories specified in section 3 of the Andhra Pradesh Reorganisation Act, 2014.
footnotes: Ins. by the Andhra Pradesh Reorganisation Act, 2014, s. 5 (w.e.f. 2-6-2014).

states.name: Delhi
states.territories: The territory which immediately before the commencement of this Constitution was comprised in the Chief Commissioner’s Province of Delhi.

states.name: Andaman and Nicobar Islands
states.territories: The territory which immediately before the commencement of this Constitution was comprised in the Chief Commissioner’s Province of the Andaman and Nicobar Islands.
footnotes: Entries 8 to 14 renumbered as entries 2 to 7 by the North-Eastern Areas (Reorganisation) Act, 1971 (81 of 1971), s. 9 (w.e.f. 21-1-1972).

states.name: Lakshadweep
states.territories: The territory specified in section 6 of the States Reorganisation Act, 1956.
footnotes: Subs. by the Laccadive, Minicoy and Amindivi Islands (Alteration of Name) Act, 1973 (34 of 1973), s. 5, for 'The Laccadive, Minicoy and Amindivi Islands' (w.e.f. 1-11-1973).

states.name: Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu
states.territories: The territory which immediately before the eleventh day of August, 1961 was comprised in Free Dadra and Nagar Haveli and the territories specified in section 4 of the Goa, Daman and Diu Reorganisation Act, 1987.
footnotes: Entry 4 relating to Dadra and Nagar Haveli was ins. by the Constitution (Tenth Amendment) Act, 1961 (10 of 1961), s. 2 (w.e.f. 11-8-1961) and subsequently amended by the Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu (Merger of Union Territories) Act, 2019 (44 of 2019), s. 5, for entries 4 and 5 (w.e.f. 19-12-2019).
Subs. by the Goa, Daman and Diu Reorganisation Act, 1987 (18 of 1987), s. 5 (w.e.f. 30-5-1987).

states.name: Puducherry
states.territories: The territories which immediately before the sixteenth day of August, 1962, were comprised in the French Establishments in India known as Pondicherry, Karikal, Mahe and Yanam.
footnotes: Ins. by the Constitution (Fourteenth Amendment) Act, 1962, s. 3 (with retrospective effect).
Subs. by the Pondicherry (Alteration of Name) Act, 2006 (44 of 2006), s. 5 for 'Pondicherry' (w.e.f. 1-10-2006).

states.name: Chandigarh
states.territories: The territories specified in section 4 of the Punjab Reorganisation Act, 1966.
footnotes: Ins. by the Punjab Reorganisation Act, 1966 (31 of 1966), s. 7 (w.e.f. 1-11-1966).

states.name: Jammu and Kashmir
states.territories: The territories specified in section 4 of the Jammu and Kashmir Reorganisation Act, 2019.
footnotes: Ins. by the Jammu and Kashmir Reorganisation Act, 2019 (34 of 2019) s. 6 (w.e.f. 31-10-2019).

states.name: Ladakh
states.territories: The territories specified in section 3 of the Jammu and Kashmir Reorganisation Act, 2019.
footnotes: Ins. by the Jammu and Kashmir Reorganisation Act, 2019 (34 of 2019) s. 6 (w.e.f. 31-10-2019).
